raw akas.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster

akas: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (original title)
akas from release info: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (original title)

1.title: Cenobites

episode of.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: A new group of drag queens begin their race to the crown by designing Cenobite looks inspired by Clive Barker's "Hellraiser" series.

2.title: Ghost Town Ghouls

episode of.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: The queens are send to an abandoned ghost town and need to create a character inspired by the ghosts of the Old West.

3.title: Shock Rock and Metal

episode of.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: The girls are divided into two bands and need to perform wearing outfits inspired by the glam rock divas of the past.

4.title: Sci-Fi Babes

episode of.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: The ghouls need to present an alien look and give birth to a baby inspired by that look.

5.title: Scream Queens

episode of.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: The Boulet take the girls to the middle of the woods and ask them to act in a horror movie.

6.title: Gothic Brides

episode of.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: The queens are given the chance of having the gothic wedding they've always dreamed.

7.title: Welcome to Wasteland: part 1

episode of.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: The top 4 contestants are taken to an post apocalyptic event, and need to take part in a photo shoot in the desert.

8.title: Welcome to Wasteland: part 2

episode of.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: The top 4 queens need to perform as a group on the Wasteland Weekend stage.

1.title: Wickedest Witch

episode of.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: The queens are challenged to put together a wicked witch look.

2.title: 80's Female Wrestler

episode of.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: The remaining queens are tasked with creating 80's inspired wrestling getup's, as well as a persona to go along with it.

3.title: Zombies in Death Valley

episode of.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: The Boulet Brothers take the queens to Death Valley where they must showcase a zombie look as well as a zombie inspired performance.

4.title: Pretty, Pink, Fishy Drag

episode of.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: This week's challenge is to show the Boulet Brothers that the queens can step outside of their comfort zone as Drag supermonsters and execute a pretty and pink look, while also performing a lip sync number.

5.title: Trannyshack Club

episode of.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Guest judges Heklina and Peaches Christ judge the queens performances, and looks at the Trannyshack Club.

6.title: Finale

episode of.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: To decide the winner, the final three contestants compete in a pageant, where they must showcase the three most important aspects of Dragula: filth, horror, and glamour.

imdb.plot outline: The Boulet Brothers host a competition to find the best alternative "Drag Monster" during a season full of cringe-worthy, creative, and drag competitions. Each week, the Boulet Brothers and guest judges eliminate the bottom performer until the winner is crowned and drenched in pig's blood in true Carrie fashion.
imdb.title: The Boulet Brothers' DRAGULA: Search for the World's First Drag Supermonster
plot: The Boulet Brothers host a competition of drag performers who don't just push the envelope - they chew it up and spit it out. With themes like Zombie and challenges like being buried alive, this ain't your momma's drag competition.::Dan Garlington

The Boulet Brothers host a competition to find the best alternative "Drag Monster" during a season full of cringe-worthy, creative, and drag competitions. Each week, the Boulet Brothers and guest judges eliminate the bottom performer until the winner is crowned and drenched in pig's blood in true Carrie fashion.
